lead_paragraph: Eduardo Cunha, the former speaker of Brazil’s lower house of Congress, is charged with corruption, accused of taking as much as $40 million in bribes for himself and allies.

headline.main: Brazilian Lawmaker Who Led Impeachment of President Is Arrested

snippet: Eduardo Cunha, the former speaker of Brazil’s lower house of Congress, is charged with corruption, accused of taking as much as $40 million in bribes for himself and allies....
abstract: Brazilian prosecutors announce Eduardo Cunha, former speaker of country's lower house of Congress, has been arrested on corruption charges; Cunha was responsible for organizing impeachment of Pres Dilma Rousseff, and faces multiple allegations.
